r.s: Framework to benchmark PHP scripts or function calls.
r.d: Framework to benchmark PHP scripts or function calls.
r.n: - Added getOutput() to print the results in human readable format and display() to show it. This functions will automatically detect the environment to select HTML or text output - Added a new param $auto to constructor. When true is passed the results will be output automatically at the end of the script execution. (contribution by Ludovico Magnocavallo)
